questions.text: What was the mission that MacGyver and his team were sent on at the start of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Find a missing bioweapon.

	The weapon was hidden in the vault at a mansion in the opening of the show. MacGyver's first mission was to get into the vault and steal it. At the time no one on his team knew what it was. He got the canister, but it was stolen back from him before he escaped the area near the mansion. MacGyver was played by Lucas Till.

questions.text: The opening scene was in Lake Como, Italy and showed Angus MacGyver jumping out of a plane.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He was stepping out of of fancy car and talking to the other members of his team via intercom. This scene was used to introduce the three main characters.

questions.text: What did MacGyver have in his pocket when passing through the metal detectors?
questions.explanation:
A Swiss Army knife.

	He was giving a voiceover about how undercover operatives get busted by carrying a concealed weapon. The guards checked him, found the knife and let him through. He joked (in the voiceover) that if he needed a weapon he'd make one.

questions.text: What was the first thing MacGyver made in the episode?
options: A remote control for a garage door
A bomb to blast open a steel door
questions.explanation:
A cloned fingerprint.

	He used soot out of the tailpipe of his car to make a fingerprint on a glass appear. Then he used tape to copy the fingerprint and tried to use that print to gain access to a locked safe. The problem was that the scanner needed an entire handprint, not just a thumb.

questions.text: How many members of MacGyver's team were shot during the first mission?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	Both MacGyver and Nikki were shot. Jack was hit over the head and knocked unconscious. This all happened before the credits rolled. MacGyver lived, he was told Nikki died.

questions.text: MacGyver worked for the DXS. What did the acronym stand for?
options: It meant nothing, was just random letters
questions.explanation:
Department of External Services.

	The department was a secret organization. According to MacGyver they frequently saved the world and no one knew anything about them. By the end of the episode the organization shut down and moved its headquarters. They renamed themselves Team Phoenix.

He dated her mother.

	Riley was the hacker that replaced Nikki on the team after she was shot. Jack had at one point beaten up Riley's real father because the father was abusive toward her mother. Riley only knew that he had beaten up her dad and resented him for it.

questions.text: Who was MacGyver's oldest friend and roommate?
questions.explanation:
Wilt Bozer.

	They had been friends since they were children, but Wilt did not know about MacGyver's real career. When Angus was shot, he was told it was a car accident. Wilt was played by Justin Hires.

True.

	He revealed this in a voice over while he was jumping on an airplane that was taking off. Nikki, recently revealed to not have died, was flying the plane. She was actually one of the villains and had stolen the virus from her own team. MacGyver had been fooled by her. She told him that their relationship was the only thing that wasn't a lie.

questions.text: Which member of the team was a pilot?
questions.explanation:
Jack.

	Keeping with the continuity from the original "MacGyver" series, Jack was the pilot. Though in the original series the character wasn't introduced until the second season, not in the pilot episode. Jack was shown flying a helicopter in this episode.
